import React from 'react'; import UserDataService from '../services/user.js'; import { TextareaAutosize } from '@material-ui/core'; function EditRecipe (props) { const item = props.location.state.currentRecipe; const [Title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [Ingredients, setIngredients] = useState(''); const [Instructions, setInstructions] = useState(''); const [Image, setImage] = useState(null); return (
{item.title}

Ingredients:
{item.ingredients}

Instructions:
{item.instructions}

Add Recipe Title
setNewTitle(e.target.value)}/>
Add Recipe Ingredients
setNewIngredients(e.target.value)}/>
Add Recipe Instructions
setNewInstructions(e.target.value)}/>
Upload Image (2:1)

setNewImage(URL.createObjectURL(event.target.files[0]))} text="upload"/>

) } export default EditRecipe;
